memberdef.argsstring: (const long double &random_number, const long double &speciation_rate, const unsigned long &no_generations)
memberdef.name: checkSpeciation

briefdescription.para: Checks whether speciation has occured for the provided parameters. Provided here for ease of use when bug-fixing.

parameterdescription.para: the random number associated with a lineage
the number of generations the lineage has existed

simplesect.para: bool the speciation state of the lineage

briefdescription.para: Contains various objects used for reconstructing the coalescence tree after simulations are complete.
